title: Joe Rogan API Experience
description: A REST API serving Joe Rogan quotes of inspiration. This service can provide one quote or multiple quotes up to fifty in a JSON format.

title: iPrice Crypto Dashboard
description: A Cryptocurrency price tracker that uses the CryptoCompare API to serve updated prices on six different coins including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Zcash, Litecoin and more.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: A Timer that uses the Pomodoro technique for completing tasks. The timer uses a react framework to power the clock and timer options for the user.

title: Employee Directory
description: Built an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API. Javascript was used to pull API data to build out employee cards and modals.

title: Simpsons Quote Machine
description: A simpson quote generator built using React.js and REST API that displays random simpsons quotes for the user.

title: Drum Machine
description: A drum machine built using React.js that plays 9 different drum sounds based off mouse clicks or corresponding keys on the keyboard.
